product_name: Nite Ize HandleBand Smartphone Handlebar Mount
long_description: A universal handlebar mount with a smart design, the Nite Ize HandleBand Smartphone Handlebar Mount uses grippy silicone to secure your phone for easy viewing. Made with a lightweight expandable silicone with an aluminum base, the single band wraps around nearly any sized bar, including bicycles, jogging strollers or shopping carts. It can be positioned wherever you want, attached and removed as often as you need, and it's designed to allow full functionality of your smartphone while it's in place. The flexible nature of silicone gives the HandleBand the capability to secure and wrap other devices, too (like flashlights or bike pumps) for extra functionality. Easily attaches to most common bar diameters in either horizontal or perpendicular configuration. Attach with zip ties for added security when leaving the HandleBand on your bike. Aluminum base piece functions as a convenient bottle opener. Fits smartphones from 2.3 x 0.4 in. - 3.6 x 0.8 in. (width and depth); fits most bar diameters from 0.9 - 2.0 in.
